name: Droplet's Adventure
description:
Droplet's Adventure

A game prototype for Three Button Jam [8 Bits to Infinity].

You play as a little droplet. You aim to complete the water cycle and collect points on your little adventure. During the game, you go through four stages of the cycle - rain, groundwater, river, and water vapor.

As the prototype was created in a limited time, some parts are unfortunately a little rushed, and the game is missing sounds and music altogether. I hope to revisit this idea in the future and make a small game from it.

Also, the game is computation-heavy in some parts. If you are using a laptop, I suggest not using the power-saving mode when playing.

If you like the idea, let me know in the comments and share your best scores :)
